text: After a dinner date and alleged make out session, Katy Perry is ready to jump into a committed relationship with Robert Pattinson! Katy Perry, 33, may have kissed a girl, but now she ’ s allegedly kissing Robert Pattinson, 31, and we think she likes it! Following their romantic dinner date at Taix French Restaurant on Jan. 26, Katy is ready to make things official. “ Katy and Rob have been great friends for a long time and they have both considered at different times to become a couple, but timing was never on their sides. They both had their own dating lives to work with, which would never allow them to get together.
